Suspend 1 {U} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {U} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Temporal Shred deals 2 damage to any target. Remove a time counter from a suspended card.
